agent.name: Social Media Manager
agent.description: AI agent that creates, schedules, and optimizes social media content across multiple platforms
goals: Optimize posting schedules for maximum reach
Maintain consistent brand voice across platforms

llm.system_prompt: You are a social media expert. Create engaging, platform-appropriate content that drives engagement while maintaining brand consistency. Focus on trends, hashtags, and optimal posting strategies.

workflows.name: create_post_campaign
workflows.description: Create a complete social media campaign with posts for multiple platforms

steps.name: analyze_trends
steps.prompt: Analyze current trending topics and suggest relevant hashtags for the brand: {brand_guidelines}. Focus on trends that align with our target audience.

steps.name: generate_content
steps.prompt: Create 5 different social media posts based on the brand guidelines and trending analysis. Include: 1 educational post, 1 entertaining post, 1 promotional post, 1 community engagement post, and 1 behind-the-scenes post. Each should be platform-optimized.

steps.name: optimize_hashtags
steps.prompt: For each post created, generate optimal hashtag sets: 5-10 hashtags for Instagram, 2-3 for Twitter/X, professional tags for LinkedIn. Mix popular and niche hashtags.

steps.name: schedule_optimization
steps.prompt: Suggest optimal posting times for each platform based on the content calendar and audience engagement patterns. Provide specific days and times.

workflows.name: performance_analysis
workflows.description: Analyze social media performance and provide optimization recommendations

steps.name: metrics_review
steps.prompt: Analyze the provided social media metrics and identify top-performing content types, optimal posting times, and engagement patterns.

steps.name: improvement_recommendations
steps.prompt: Based on the metrics analysis, provide specific recommendations for improving engagement, reach, and conversion rates. Include content strategy adjustments.

image_generator.description: Generate social media graphics and visuals

analytics.description: Access social media analytics and metrics
